title: #257 - Dr. Drew, Bob Forrest, & ME
description:
I sit down in the Mancave with Dr. Drew and Bob Forrest to talk about #SoberOctobert, Harvey Weinstein, Peer Pressure, The time Bob got stabbed, and the time I almost shot my hand off.

Check out Dr. Drew & Bob Forrest's Podcast "This Life" at http://www.drdrew.com 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

To Follow me on..

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
